alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 3:33AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Victoria and eastern Goliad Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 333 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Goliad, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Goliad, Mission Valley, Schroeder, Weser, Ander and Nursery. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 628 and 648. US Highway 59 between mile markers 660 and 676. US Highway 87 near mile marker 800. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
